item.title: Extending the gh CLI with Go
item.description: GitHub’s gh CLI can be enhanced via custom extensions. The following offers an introduction, as well as some notes and tips for doing so in Go. What? Extensions How do gh extensions work? Implementation tips, suggestions, etc. Bonus experimental idea: bootstrapping developer experience and platform engineering Further reading What? Out of the box, the gh CLI supports a collection of commands for interacting with GitHub features like repositories, releases, pull requests, and more.
